refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: The bitwise operators perform operations of bitwise AND, bitwise OR, bitwise NOT and bitwise non-equivalence.

refsect1.title: Syntax
refsect1.para: where the arguments a and b may be further expressions. They are converted to the nearest integer to machine precision and then the operation is performed.

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: The priority of these operators is less binding that the arithmetic ones, but more binding that the comparisons.
Parentheses may be used as above to force particular groupings.
